title: From Paychecks to Prosperity: Building the Financial Capability of Youth in Workforce Programs
summary: Produced by Prosperity Now, this report shares new insights gleaned from the Youth Financial Capability Fund that can help agencies serving youth embed financial capability services -- including financial education, access to safe and affordable accounts and saving opportunities -- into their existing workforce programs. These services can help young people build financial confidence, develop financial goals and understand the impact of their financial choices as they enter the workforce.
tag-1: From Paychecks to Prosperity: Building the Financial Capability of Youth in Workforce Programs
